thread.title: Kunchacko Boban shares his secret to stay happy
thread.title_full: Kunchacko Boban shares his secret to stay happy - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Kunchacko Boban shares his secret to stay happy
text:
Kunchacko Boban seems to have cracked the code of being positive. Despite the numerous highs and lows of career, the actor seem to be unperturbed.
He tells us he makes it a point to stay upbeat no matter what the circumstance. "Even if the movie shooting finishes at 2am, I wake up the next morning at 6am and go play a game of badminton before hitting the sets again. I try to enjoy each moment and stay positive at the end of it," says the Traffic star.
Kunchacko's latest release is Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi , which also stars Bharath, Nedumudi Veni, Jacob Gregory and Reenu Mathews.
